Reviews.Title: bad battery
Reviews.Author: smelvin123
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item, and when I received it the battery does not charge.  I have other battery's of same type from my last computer of same model.  It did not come with a windows disk???I called the # on the package it came shipped in and the person never called me back.

Reviews.Title: Light, ok for travel
Reviews.Author: N. Cho "nandolvvlln"
Reviews.Content: Light, yes. But it being widescreen makes it a little "bigger" to carry, although it still fits in a standard backpack. After about a year and a half of this the fan started to weaken and now I can hear it run (it's pretty loud). Overall, not bad, but I wish the fan wasn't dying on me.
